info.name: CRM Healthcare API
info.description: API collection untuk CRM Healthcare/Pharmaceutical Platform - Sales CRM

request.description: Login dengan email dan password. Response akan menyertakan JWT token dan refresh token.
Refresh access token menggunakan refresh token.

item.name: Master Data
User Management

request.description: Get list of users with pagination
Get user permissions in hierarchical menu structure

item.description: User Management endpoints untuk mengelola users, roles, dan permissions

item.name: Account Management

request.description: Get list of accounts with pagination

item.description: Account Management endpoints untuk mengelola accounts (Hospitals, Clinics, Pharmacies)

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category Management endpoints untuk mengelola account categories (Hospital, Clinic, Pharmacy)

item.name: Contact Roles

request.description: Get list of all contact roles
Get contact role details by ID

item.description: Contact Role Management endpoints untuk mengelola contact roles (Doctor, PIC, Manager, Other)

item.name: Contact Management

request.description: Get list of contacts with pagination

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "name": "Dr. John Doe",
  "role_id": "contact_role_id_here",
  "phone": "081234567890",
  "email": "doctor@example.com",
  "position": "Chief Medical Officer",
  "notes": "Primary contact for medical supplies"
}

item.description: Contact Management endpoints untuk mengelola contacts (Doctors, PICs, Managers)

item.name: Sales Pipeline Management
Pipeline Stages

request.description: Get list of all pipeline stages

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "stage_abc123",
      "name": "Lead",
      "code": "lead",
      "order": 1,
      "color": "#94A3B8",
      "is_active": true,
      "is_won": false,
      "is_lost": false,
      "description": "New lead that needs qualification",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "stage_def456",
      "name": "Qualification",
      "code": "qualification",
      "order": 2,
      "color": "#3B82F6",
      "is_active": true,
      "is_won": false,
      "is_lost": false,
      "description": "Qualifying the lead to determine if it's a good fit",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "filters": {
      "is_active": true
    }
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
  "request_id": "req_abc123xyz"
}

request.description: Get pipeline stage details by ID
Get pipeline summary statistics (total deals, won/lost/open deals, value by stage)
Get forecast data for deals (expected revenue, weighted revenue)

item.description: Pipeline Stages endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages (Lead, Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

item.name: Deals

request.description: Get list of deals with pagination and filters

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "deal_abc123",
      "title": "New Deal Opportunity",
      "description": "Deal description here",
      "account_id": "account_xyz789",
      "account": {
        "id": "account_xyz789",
        "name": "Rumah Sakit Umum"
      },
      "contact_id": "contact_def456",
      "contact": {
        "id": "contact_def456",
        "name": "Dr. John Doe",
        "email": "doctor@example.com",
        "phone": "081234567890"
      },
      "stage_id": "stage_abc123",
      "stage": {
        "id": "stage_abc123",
        "name": "Lead",
        "code": "lead",
        "order": 1,
        "color": "#94A3B8",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_won": false,
        "is_lost": false
      },
      "value": 50000000,
      "value_formatted": "Rp 500.000",
      "probability": 50,
      "expected_close_date": "2024-12-31T00:00:00+07:00",
      "actual_close_date": null,
      "assigned_to": "user_789",
      "assigned_user": {
        "id": "user_789",
        "name": "Sales Rep Name",
        "email": "sales@example.com"
      },
      "status": "open",
      "source": "website",
      "notes": "Additional notes",
      "created_by": "user_789",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "page": 1,
      "per_page": 20,
      "total": 150,
      "total_pages": 8,
      "has_next": true,
      "has_prev": false,
      "next_page": 2,
      "prev_page": null
    },
    "filters": {}
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
  "request_id": "req_abc123xyz"
}

request.description: Create a new deal. Value is in smallest currency unit (sen). Probability is 0-100 percentage.

request.description: Update deal information. All fields are optional.
Move deal to a different pipeline stage. Status will be automatically updated based on stage (won/lost/open).

item.description: Deals endpoints untuk mengelola sales deals/opportunities
Sales Pipeline Management endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages dan deals
Endpoints untuk master data Sales CRM
